name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cherry Blossom Tree: Beautiful Live Wallpaper for Chrome!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the serene beauty of a cherry blossom tree to your browser with this stunning live wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This peaceful live wallpaper captures the delicate elegance of a cherry blossom tree in full bloom, its petals gently falling in the breeze. The soft, calming pink hues create a tranquil atmosphere, transforming your browser into a peaceful sanctuary. Perfect for nature lovers or anyone seeking a moment of relaxation.

Along with the breathtaking visuals, this extension includes a customizable Google search bar, popular site shortcuts for quick access, and a real-time date and time display. Enjoy the beauty of nature while keeping your browsing organized. Download now and immerse yourself in the calming charm of the cherry blossom tree!
